title: Flame Blade
content: d for dual wielding. Extra damage riders, like 'weapon attacks deal 2 acid damage,' applies to the attack. Attacking with flame blade is not a spell. Arcane Acuity does NOT add to the attack roll. Arcane Synergy does NOT add bonus damage. Dueling Fighting Style adds 2 Fire damage. Savage Attacker Feat works. Hunter's Mark and Hex work.
